ABOUT_SECTION1: For several years I've lived in Darmstadt now. Here I feel like at home, not only because of studying and working. The real reason are my lovely friends, who make my day everytime I feel bad. My hometown is Heusenstamm, where I feel like at home as well. Regularly I'm there to visit family and friends and for my sport.
